Welcome to my surfing community, where the water is always warm and…okay. I burned myself out on the whole creative writing gig with the community “about” page. I love surfing as much as anything else on this planet, and I look forward to sharing my adventures with you. If you haven’t ever surfed, get on a board. All of you floating around out there in the communities who are down to ski, snowboard, skateboard, or longboard should definitely catch a wave any chance you can get. The transition isn’t that difficult as long as you have the core/balance that it takes to carve the side of a mountain at a decently high speed.


Why do I love November? I’ll tell you why: the North Shore. This is when Oahu becomes the premier surf spot in the world. The waves don’t get better than the stretch of beaches (about 7 miles) on the North Shore in November and usually through February, but November through December is definitely prime. Santa got it wrong by posting up in the North Pole.


Anyway, I booked my ticket to leave right after Christmas. Can’t wait!
